title: KaOS Linux 2023.09 Adds KDE Gear 23.08, Focus to Shift on KDE Plasma 6 ISO
description:
Powered by Linux kernel 6.4, KaOS 2023.09 includes the latest KDE Gear 23.08 software suite alongside the KDE Plasma 5.27.8 and KDE Frameworks 5.110 updates.

The post KaOS Linux 2023.09 Adds KDE Gear 23.08, Focus to Shift on KDE Plasma 6 ISO appeared first on Linux Today.
